attributes.action: allow we the students of Cranbrook School, Kent, to play poker in the sixth form centre.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently our teacher, who we shall refer to as Mrs.X, has banned all card games including poker in our free periods and breaks. We feel extremely agrieved and feel it is an infringement on our basic human rights. We do not play for money simply for the enjoyment and intelectual challenge of the game. We therefore ask you the public to show us your support to reinstate our freedom to play cards. Thank you

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
